message.content:
When you were 6 years old and your sister was half your age, that means she was 6/2 = 3 years old at that time.
Now that you are 80 years old, we can calculate the difference in age between you two by subtracting the age when you were 6 from your current age: 80 - 6 = 74 years.
So, your sister is currently 3 + 74 = 77 years old.
